# clickedColumn

**Instance Property**

The column number of the cell that the user clicked to display a context menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var clickedColumn: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is `-1` if no context menu is active.

## Handling Mouse-Click Events

- **doClick(_:)**: Responds to (single) mouse clicks in a column of the browser.
- **doDoubleClick(_:)**: Responds to double clicks in a column of the browser.
- **clickedRow**: The row number of the cell that the user clicked to display a context menu.
